text: Antonio Marcellini (January 17, 1937–May 22, 2010) was an Italian professional football player. Born in Rome, he played for 4 seasons (29 games, no goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma and U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:A.S. title: Antonio Marcellini
